channel.title: What the fuck?!
channel.description:
hey guys i found this perfect old school client for my cammy pvp server and there is 1 problem to it. when you click on the prayers that go above your head i dont know why but the client just freezes and lags out. here is my error
RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1344) at client.method146(client.java:11922) at client.method102(client.java:7785) at client.method9(client.java:8658) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4467) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: What the fuck?!
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

I’m not sure exactly how to fix it. I’m just assuming that the icons are being drawn from the wrong folder. The only way you’re going to learn is if you try to figure it our yourself. That’s how I’m becoming better with programming.

Read full topic

item.title: What the fuck?!
item.dc:creator: @Pro4Show Pro4Show
item.description:
@Pro4Show wrote:

you think u can help me fix bud? cause i have no clue on clients.

Read full topic

item.title: What the fuck?!
item.dc:creator: @legit_99 legit 99
item.description:
@legit_99 wrote:

My guess is that in client.java lines 1344, 11922, 7785, and 8658 are all the methods for the image to go above your head. Something is probably wrong there with where the sprites are loading from or something… Client sided I’m assuming.

Read full topic
